lines.text: Now listen cutie-pie. I'm a big, bad trumpet player, and never in my life have I seen anything so gorgeous coming off a dance floor. I've seen thousands. I've kissed some of them, but not like I'm going to kiss you.
How about you, Sinjin, when are you getting married?
What for? I got a lot of girls that are just pulling their hair waiting for me to call them.
Are you kidding? I'm sick of running around with bald dames.
Why don't you find someone your own age - about 104?

[as Bill Abbott approaches yet another pretty girl]
There he goes. Out of the frying pan, into the frying pan!
I'll bust ya right where ya sit!
Ah, that would be a foul.
